metadata.title: CVE-2022-3008 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The tinygltf library uses the C library function wordexp() to perform filepath expansion on untrusted paths that are provided from the input file.This function allows for command injection by using backticks. An attackercould craft an untrusted path input that would result in a path expansion.We recommend upgrading to 2.6.0 or past commit52ff00a38447f06a17eab1caa2cf0730a119c751

criterions.comment: tinygltf package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
